scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a man, identified as Christ, wearing a crown of thorns and a halo, suggesting a religious context. He is shown bare-chested, with marks of scourging on his torso. His hands are bound in front of him. To his left, a column with a rope tied around it is visible, and to his right, a whip hangs from a vertical element. The scene appears to be set within an architectural space, indicated by the presence of columns and a floor.
